item.title: The Student Academic Choice Awards are back!
item.author: Natalie A M Kempston,
item.description: After the huge success of last year’s awards the Student Academic Choice Awards (SACAs) are back, and this year they are bigger than ever! In case you haven’t heard of them, the SACAs are awards for academics and support staff, nominated and chosen entirely by students. The awards are designed to …

item.title: #LoveYourRep
item.author: Natalie A M Kempston,
item.description: Rep Week is starting on Monday and provides a platform to celebrate the great changes that have taken place with the help of your Academic Representation Network. Just last month a record number of students voted in our Your Rep Elections and there are now over 430 Academic Reps working, for you, in …
